original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ bhikkhu bhagavataḥ avidūre nisinnaḥ hoti pallaṅka

original: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya purāṇakammavipākajaṁ dukkhaṁ tibbaṁ kharaṁ kaṭukaṁ
analyzed: ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya purāṇa kamma vipāka jam dukkham tibbam kharam kaṭuka
vedanam adhivāsentaḥ sataḥ sampajānaḥ a vihaññamānaḥ

original: Addasā kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ avidūre nisinnaṁ pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā tam bhikkhum avidūre nisinnam pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya

original: purāṇakammavipākajaṁ dukkhaṁ tibbaṁ kharaṁ kaṭukaṁ vedanaṁ adhivāsentaṁ sataṁ sampajānaṁ avihaññamānaṁ.
analyzed: purāṇa kamma vipāka jam dukkham tibbam kharam kaṭukam vedanam adhivāsentam satam sampajānam a vihaññamāna

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
atthaḥ na atthi janam lapetava iti
